flawed_nl_solution:
Stan needs to write 2000 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=2000>>2000
This will take him 40 minutes because 2000 / 50 = <<2000/50=40>>40
He drinks 0.03 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 0.03
He will drink 1 ounces of water while writing the paper because 40 x (0.03) = <<40*0.03=1>>1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.25, not 0.025. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
